Blog

Facebook Messaging

At the end of the day, Facebook will survive because of its messaging service. They offer one key factor that no other messaging service provides. Not even email.

The Reply-All opt out.


Nothing kills an email thread faster than when I reply all. But with Facebook group messaging, you don’t have to wait for my response. They let you voluntarily leave the conversation. This single feature will keep Facebook in the game for a very long time. 

Original

March 27, 2013
